Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Editorial Board Member, Global Challenges, Wiley

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Presentation: “Meta-analysis of expert elicitations of future technology outcomes”, Energy Modeling Forum, Climate Change Impacts and Integrated Assessment (CCI/IA) Conference, Snowmass
Presentation: “Migration, Ethnic Diversity and Innovation: A European Perspective”, Norface Conference, London
Presentation: “The impact of policy and uncertainty on innovation in the wind industry: evidence from European countries”, European Economic Association Conference
Presentation: “The Distributional Impact of Renewable Energy Support: Evidence from Italy”, International Energy Workshop, Abu Dhabi
Presentation: “The Drivers of Investment in Clean Energy Production”, EAERE Conference, Helsinki
Presentation: “Trade and Knowledge Flows: the case of renewable Energy Generation”, Common Future Under Climate Change, Paris
Presentation: "Intra-EU knowledge flows in the renewable energy sector: A patent citation analysis”, Conference on the Economics of Innovation, Diffusion, Growth and the Environment, London
Presentation: “Demand System Analysis for Italian Households: Elasticities and Welfare Effects of RES-E Incentives”, IAERE Conference, Bologna
Presentation: “The impact of policy and uncertainty on innovation in the wind industry: evidence from European countries”, Resource for the Future, Washing DC
Presentation: “Insights from the ENTRACTE Project”, High Level Panel of EU Decarbonization Pathways, DG Research, European Commission, Brussels.
Presentation: “The role of internalization instruments in incentivising innovation”, with A. Dechezlepretre and T. Goeschl, SINERGIA Workshop: Incentivizing the Grand Challenges, Geneva

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: International Fellowship, University of Washington, Seattle
Teaching Assistant Fellowship (various: Program for the Environment, Department of French and Italian Studies, Evans School of Public Affairs)
PhD Fellowship, Universita' Cattolica del Sacro Cuore
Premio alla Ricerca, Universita' degli Studi di Milano, DEAS
Presentation Award, Best Presentation at FEEM Convention

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Researcher - ICARUS: Innovation for Climate chAnge mitigation: a study of energy R&d, its Uncertain effectiveness and Spillovers
Reseacher - ClimTech project - Diffusion of Climate-Friendly Technologies. The Role of Intellectual Property Rights, Human Capital and Environmental Policy
Researcher - TEAM Project ( Technology Elicitations and Modeling Project)
Reseacher - LIMITS Project - Low climate IMpact scenarios and the Implications of required Tight emission control Strategies
Researcher - Deep Decarbonization Pathways Project - Italy - DDPP-Italy
Researcher - THE POLITICAL ECONOMY OF CLEAN ENERGY TRANSITIONS - PECE
Scientific Coordinator - INNOPATHS: Innovation pathways, strategies and policies for the Low-Carbon Transition in Europe

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Teaching Assistant - Environmental Studies, Microeconomics and Statistics - University of Washington, Seattle
Teaching Assistant - Microeconomics (Graduate and Undergraduate, Italian and English) - Universita' degli Studi di Milano
Teaching Assistant - Labour Economics, Human Resources, Political Economy - Universita' Cattolica del Sacro Cuore
Visiting Fellow - OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development)
Docente a Contratto - Statistics and Econometrics - Corso di Laurea in Environmental and Food Economics - Universita' degli Studi di Milano
Visiting Fellow - RFF - Resource for the Future

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Work Package Leader - WP4 - FEEM - ENTRACTE PROJECT
